fields.text: Thank you for calling Aerotek San Francisco, the leading recruitment and staffing agency bringing great people and great organizations together.
If you are a job seeker looking for new opportunities, press [INDEX].
To speak with a recruiter about current job openings, press [INDEX].
To learn how to submit your resume online, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to one of our recruiters.
An agent will be with you shortly to guide you through our online application process.
If you are an employer seeking staffing solutions, press [INDEX].
To discuss temporary or temp to hire staffing options, press [INDEX].
To schedule a consultation for permanent placement services, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our staffing specialist.
One of our account managers will be with you momentarily.
